remarks: The successor value resulting from finite recursive definition generation.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 15-Aug-2019.)
statement:
frecsuc $p |- ( ( A. z ( F ` z ) e. _V /\ A e. V /\ B e. _om ) -> ( frec ( F , A ) ` suc B ) = ( F ` ( frec ( F , A ) ` B ) ) ) $.
$d A z $.
$d B z $.
$d F z $.
